status.description: Optional string to determine the status of the Tooltip.

open.description:
The `open` state of the floating element to synchronize with the
`isPositioned` value.

onOpenChange.type: (open: boolean, event?: Event, reason?: OpenChangeReason) => void
onOpenChange.description:
An event callback that is invoked when the floating element is opened or
closed.

placement.description: Where to place the floating element relative to the reference element.

content.description: Content displayed inside the Tooltip. Can be a string or a React component.

hideArrow.description: Whether to hide the Tooltip arrow. Defaults to `false`.

hideIcon.description:
Whether to hide the status icon within the Tooltip. Defaults to `false`.
If no status is provided, icon will also be hidden.

enterDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before the Tooltip is shown.

leaveDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before the Tooltip is hidden. Defaults to 300ms.

disabled.description: Option to not display the Tooltip. Can be used in conditional situations like text truncation. Defaults to 0.

disableHoverListener.description: Option to remove the hover listener.

disableFocusListener.description: Option to remove the focus listener.
